subject: Flash Sale, EU Launch & Tons of Exciting News

full_threads.body:
(Yes,‌ there's a TL;DR)
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

TL;DR
  1. Termageddon 2.0 is here! - Improved UI, pre-filled answers, more sharing options, agency Team Member access, better on-page support (Termaguider), and faster updates.
  2. Now covering over 120 laws, rules, and regulations - we are, by far, covering more regulations than any other solution on the planet.. Possibly the universe. See our new coverage page.
  3. EU/EEA Launch is live! - Termageddon is now available for website owners located in the EU and EEA. English policies to start (plus multi-language consent).
  4. CIPA lawsuits are not going anywhere - Bill SB690 fails to stop attorneys from preying on website owners. Educate your clients. Protect your own agency.
  5. We partnered with Code Snippets to create a new Google Consent Mode article - Steps have been simplified and paired with better explanations and a video guide.
  6. Flash Sale is now available - 15 licenses for less than the price of 3 (add +$1,800/yr to your recurring revenue). Renews at the same price annually. Details below.

Fellow Agency Partners,

With the launch of Termageddon 2.0, things are moving quickly! Here's everything you need to know as an agency partner:
Now covering over 120 laws, rules, and regulations!

We no longer cover more laws than everyone else in the market… we now cover WAY MORE. Jokes aside, we're serious about helping our customers protect themselves. With our most recent Disclaimer update, we have surpassed over 100 laws now being covered!
SEE OUR NEW COVERAGE PAGE
EU/EEA business compatibility is now available!

We've launched in the EU and EEA! While we've covered GDPR since its inception, this update takes into account legal entity types on a per-EU/EEA country basis, consumer protection laws specific to EU/EEA businesses, contractual requirements, and more.

To start, we're providing policies only in English. However, we'll be working on multi-language in the future.
CIPA demand letters continue targeting small business website owners (primarily throughout the US)

Update to the CIPA saga: In April, a bill (SB690) was introduced to help slow down the number of lawsuits targeting small business website owners for non-compliance with the California Invasion of Privacy Act (CIPA). Unfortunately, the bill's sponsor said SB690 has stalled, implying the predatory demand letters we're seeing will continue for the foreseeable future.

We strongly encourage all agency partners (especially those servicing US customers) to learn about CIPA and what you can do to help your clients protect themselves from getting letters demanding $50,000 or more in damages. Free client educational material included in that link!
New (simplified) Google Consent Mode article

Loading multiple tags via Google Tag Manager? This article is for you!

We partnered up with Code Snippets to provide our audiences with a simplified guide on how to set up compatibility with Google Consent Mode. We discuss Advanced vs Basic, and show you how to get everything set up and tested in just a few steps!

Most WordPress agency owners are already familiar with Code Snippets, but if you aren't, check out this special deal they put together for our audience! (Not an affiliate link - just a great company we love working with!)
Rapid Fire Updates
  • Major update to our Disclaimer generator, where we added 87 laws, rules and regulations. We now offer Disclaimer sections for testimonials, comments, Intellectual Property (Fair Use), and disclosures for attorneys in all markets. Our support article shows you how to take advantage of these upgrades.
  • Our popular geolocation feature for our Cookie Consent Banners is now available on all web platforms.
  • Our service is now available to businesses in all U.S. Territories (Guam, U.S. Virgin Islands, etc.).
FLASH SALE - Reseller Special - 15pack for $328.90/year (adds $1,800/year in recurring revenue)

Our most popular bulk deal is live for today only!

How it works:

Step 1: Buy the 15pack Flash Sale for $328.90/year
Step 2: Use our pre-written emails to resell each license for $120/year
Step 3 (optional/recommended): Charge a one-time implementation fee of $100-$250 per client
Step 4: Enjoy up to $1,800/year in new recurring revenue!

This deal pays for itself after just three client sign ups!

Included with each 15pack purchase:

  • 15 licenses - Each license includes a set of policies (+ consent solution) to protect one website
  • Renews annually at the same price (whether you use some or all of the licenses).
  • Pre-written email sequence (to sign up past clients)
  • 30-day money back guarantee
  • Free swag item from shop.termageddon.com
GET YOUR 15PACK
Or follow these instructions: log in with your support@wolfiq.com.au email address, click your initials (top right corner), click 'billing' click 'buy bulk licenses' to view/purchase the Flash Sale Special.

Reminder: You are an agency partner, meaning you can always buy licenses, one at a time, at wholesale rates (at $42.24/year per license). This bulk deal is optional and is just for those who are looking to save more.
Phew, you've made it! Thank you so much for your support. As always, we're just an email away if you have any questions!

- Team Termageddon


Termageddon.com
Phone: 312-754-1829
Email: Support@termageddon.com


Termageddon, LLC is not a law firm and nothing in this email should be considered legal advice. The contents of this email are not protected by attorney-client privilege. You should speak to an attorney prior to implementing any policy or privacy solutions. This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. If you have received this email in error, please notify us immediately. If you are not the named addressee, you must not disseminate, distribute or copy this email. If you have received this email by mistake, you must delete this email immediately from your system.
Click here to receive law updates only. You will no longer receive updates on new products or new features.

Unsubscribe from everything, including law updates and update requirements. If you unsubscribe from privacy law alerts, you will no longer be notified when new questions need to be answered to update your policies with newly required disclosures.
Sent to: support@wolfiq.com.au


Termageddon LLC, 3833 E Main St., Unit #2034, Saint Charles, IL 60174, United States
